page.title: 19Child's Life in the Claydons
page.content: {A day in the life of a 7 year old in {Steeple Claydon-afternoon- 1315 Work in classroom 1420 Playtime 1435 Work in classroom 1515 Go home (From 9 years old the school day extends to 1545) 1530 At home,ride on bikes with friends or watch television 1700 Tea - Cheese sandwiches,cake and an apple.A cooked meal is eaten by some children especially those who had a packed lunch. 1800 Activities such as: Swimming in the school pool Horse riding Brownies Ballet classes in Padbury 2000 Bath,brush teeth,read astory and go to bed.
